databaseConfig.sql:
select MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI_ID , SENTAISETSUBI , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
from MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI WHERE (DELETE_FLAG = 0 or DELETE_FLAG is NULL)

INSERT INTO MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI ( MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI_ID , SENTAISETSUBI , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI_ID , :SENTAISETSUBI , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI SET SENTAISETSUBI = :SENTAISETSUBI, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI_ID = :MS_DJ_SENTAISETSUBI_ID
